html:
7.30.21  1:35 am   Why do u make me laugh?

      the only thing that ever makes anyone laugh is the cold hard truth, which you may have been reminded of somehow, whether directly or indirectly

7.30.21  1:11 am   were you actually stuck in a rut when you made "i'm stuck in a rut"?

      yes

7.30.21  12:23 am   Who is the princess in "I'm a princess"

      everyone

7.29.21  8:43 pm   Can ghosts only say "boo"? 

      i don't even think they can say that

7.29.21  6:12 pm   What was it that made you enjoy music so much (whether it was as a kid or as an adult)?

      it's music which makes me enjoy music, for my entire life so far

7.29.21  5:48 pm   please help - how do you count "save the best for last"? where is the downbeat?

      the opening riff, and opening line of every verse, .... and actually every line of the song, is placed at "3 & 4 &", going into bar 1 of the line

7.29.21  5:20 pm   what is the best use for a blender?

      blend another blender. you'll never be able to blend a blender with the same blender, so as soon as you've got that second blender, you might as well take advantage

7.29.21  2:23 pm   how do i make things look good?

      put a rectangle around them

7.29.21  11:44 am   How would you create in the middle of noise and chaos? Do you need a calm space to focus?

      if you can learn to understand the noise, then it will seem calm

7.29.21  11:27 am   is the earth flat?

      it was supposed to be, but something went insanely wrong

7.29.21  10:27 am   I noticed you wrote "I'm a Princess" long before "Here Comes the Sun"

     that's not true. 95% of here comes the sun was written before 2013. i'm a princess was written in 2019

      but the latter was released first as a video. Is there any particular reason why?

     everything had changed, since starting on the princess video. so i wanted to start fresh on a new selection, instead of continuing on 'princess'. for the new selection i chose 'here comes the sun'

7.29.21  9:09 am   Do you intend to post a video "might quit" in the last 2 years?

      i inteded to release that one. it was a music video for a song i wrote

7.29.21  8:11 am   why don't you make longer songs?

      i'm proud to say i now make songs exactly the length that i think each particular song should be. in the past, this was not necessarily true and it might have been to reduce the production time

7.29.21  7:45 am   have you ever had a therapist that was not you?

      yes, it's everyone else

7.29.21  7:35 am   How do you come up with music video ideas? They're really good

      basically i try to keep them within the budget, then when the bosses aren't looking i break the budget at the last minute. then no one's happy because the video never comes out

7.29.21  7:10 am   are you planning on making an album

      i'd rather make more songs than however many songs that would be

7.29.21  1:06 am   How did you become organized in 2012? Looking for organization strategies to help me create things when I sit down to work on them, thx

Also I like the questions page, thanks for putting time in to answer questions 

      try this: if your desk is facing the wall, try switching it so your back is to the wall, and you are facing toward the door. set it up like a real estate office. pretend you have customers

7.28.21  11:19 pm   If the earth is round is it possible to travel around the world just by digging down?

      no

7.28.21  11:01 pm   Is talent overrated p

      what is it rated

7.28.21  10:06 pm   Are you next in line to be queen of england? 

      no

7.28.21  9:15 pm   at what point in the process do vocals get recorded? do you do a demo vocal while you're writing, just record as you write etc. - i tend to produce vocals as i'm writing and i think im alone in that

      i write before producing. improvising has also been a very serious hobby/obsession for me, but for some reason that doesn't usually coincide very much with producing, even if i sometimes think it should

7.28.21  8:24 pm   if a song is 10 minutes long, is it too long?

      that depends how good it is

7.28.21  8:19 pm   When you wrote "I'm Crazy/It's Raining", was it actually raining?

      i don't think so

7.28.21  7:16 pm   can there be a song that isn't major or minor? (Or dorian or lydian or whatever either)

     yes, that's about the same as finding a face that's neither happy or sad. it turns out, 'happy' and 'sad' are just approximate labels for the way you think a face made you feel. some people may even disagree on what's a happy or sad face

      That's not to say it doesn't have a key signature. Lets say it has two sharps but it started on G#, ended on Bb and wasn't diatonic. What is it called then?

     you'd have to listen to it to tell. just like you'd probably have to look at a picture of a face to be able to tell which way is up. you will intuitively know when you look at it, even if you can't describe how you figured it out

7.28.21  6:59 pm   i noticed in some of your non-song videos you have little melodies or background music going on. is there a thought process behind those or do you just play random notes on the keyboard and call it good?

      neither: i actually check to see what's good, not by process of thought but by process of listening to whether or not it makes the whole video seem better at that point

7.28.21  6:46 pm   What is your songwriting/editing process look like?

      to explain it in terms of coleslaw: imagine you really need some coleslaw, in case of coleslaw shortage. then your wish is granted, now your entire house is filled, from floor to ceiling, with coleslaw. the problem now is it's difficult to see or breathe

7.28.21  6:25 pm   when will the new song come out?

      when i've come to my senses

7.28.21  3:42 pm   do you still feel like making songs is like being in jail? 

      sometimes it's like trying to find your way into jail

7.28.21  1:13 pm   Can you please give me a rough translation of the poem you wrote in your spare time in "When I Get Older"? The one with the very interesting metaphors. Thank you.

      the 'poetry' would be a metaphor for anything i've posted on billwurtz dot com

7.28.21  10:32 am   how does one go about being sensible?

      set the clock to your favorite time

7.28.21  9:44 am   when will you release a new song, bill?

      when i'm a little smarter

7.28.21  9:03 am   do you like planes?

      yes

7.28.21  9:00 am   do you like people?

      yes

7.28.21  7:16 am   how do i find the road

      it's you

7.28.21  6:35 am   what word isn't the next video's title

      the

7.28.21  6:34 am   how do you cope with the impossibility of doing everything at once? it's driving me insane, tips would be much appreciated.

      find just 2 things that you can do at once. cherish that experience

7.28.21  6:25 am   I wrote my first song. is it ok that the chorus is the same line 4 times

      that all depends whether you like it

7.28.21  6:09 am   thoughts on gravity?

      reliable

7.28.21  2:04 am   how does one handle being alone? 

      tell your story. i promise someone will find it. stories always get found

7.28.21  1:58 am   is at the airport terminal a nursery rhyme?

      no

7.28.21  1:18 am   when did you decide to make longer videos over 1 minute?

      i always wanted to. the question is, when would i be capable, and how long would it take. i'm still trying to answer those questions, to this day

7.28.21  12:38 am   are your videos cool?

      sort of

7.28.21  12:33 am   I want to be a musician who performs live but I'm scared of getting older and losing interest (like Collins, for example) I fantasise about being a young , energetic and excited performer but I know that's not going to last forever. What should I do about this?

      just do the best you can

7.27.21  11:08 pm   What Genre is your music?

      urgent

7.27.21  9:55 pm   do you have a favorite chord inversion on the piano? i personally like 2nd inversion chords the best. something about having the 5th of the chord be on the bottom sounds real good to me

      different ways will be better at different times in the music. i never bothered learning which inversions are called '2nd' or '1st' because at different points in the music, different ones become the most obvious first choice

7.27.21  9:50 pm   do you ever make your own problems

      yes

7.27.21  9:19 pm   What key would a song be in if the only notes with accidentals are on F#, D#, & A#?

     you can't tell unless you either listen to it, or otherwise ascertain the entire contents and then make an intuitive judgement from there

     I'm trying to figure out how to put chords under a melody I came up with, but kind of have no idea what I'm doing. Your help is very much appreciated, thank you.

     what i would suggest is just add one harmony note to one of the notes, at only one point in the song .... choose wisely. Keep in mind, the goal is to give the listener a greater experience. You can always test this by listening to your song and seeing how great of an experience it gives you. The longer it's been since you've heard the song, the more accurate a reading you will get

7.27.21  8:47 pm   Bill, do you start your songs creating a melody or a harmony?

      melody+lyric at the same time, and most of the harmony becomes pretty obvious at that point

7.27.21  8:32 pm   Why is popcorn wonderful?

      because it's so lightweight

7.27.21  7:16 pm   if you want, whats the most vague hint you can give about the next song

      i'm doing a very good job on it, which is unfortunately throwing a huge wrench in my plans to make a lot of songs and more things. it might even ruin this one
